short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension track total number of cases of Coronavirus, deathes and recovered people, around the world and your country.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an ad-free alternative to many others that lets you track number of people tested positive with Coronavirus, deaths due to it and people recovered from it around the world. And also from you country. It has a beautiful, responsive and light weight UI. It will take your location automatically and show you customized data according to you location.
